description.intro: — I am Marek Czyż, a software engineer & amatour cyclist based in Warsaw:-)
description.full:
I've always been drawn to the development. I started my career mainly as a frontend developer, but as time was passing by I started to be more focused on backend and it stayed like that till now. My skills are quite wide: from back-end to front-end development. I enjoy each aspect of it (but solving back-end challenges the most:-)), and building sites from start to finish. I'm available for remote work.

After hours I ride a bike a lot and fast as a road cyclist and it feels great!

If you would like to build something together, get in touch!

skills.tools: Javascript, ES6, React, Redux, Gatsby, Jest, CSS3
